events.message: I am filing a claim for the auto accident that occurred last Thursday involving my vehicle and another car at the intersection.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the description of the collision and damage to the vehicle.
An agent has been assigned to manage the claim and will provide support throughout the investigation process.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim and have started reviewing all submitted information related to the car accident.
Please provide a copy of the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and any repair estimates to proceed further.
All requested documents including the police report and repair quotes have been submitted for your review.
The investigation into the auto accident claim has been initiated to determine liability and assess damages.
The investigation has been completed successfully and all relevant facts have been established to support claim processing.
A settlement proposal has been generated based on the damage assessment and policy coverage for your review.
The customer has provided positive feedback regarding the handling of their auto accident claim and response time.
The claim has been approved for payment based on final agreement and verification of all required documentation.
The payment for the approved auto accident claim was issued successfully to the customerâ€™s designated bank account.
The auto accident claim file has been closed after final payment and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
The claim documents and records for this auto accident case have been archived as per company policy.
